text: 15.78 Part 5 seeks to ensure that development involving railway arches does not prejudice the delivery of any planned transport infrastructure. This reflects the fact that railway arches form part of the existing transport infrastructure and are often the primary locations for the development of new or enhanced transport infrastructure. The development of this infrastructure may require special access arrangements within and around the railway arches. Therefore, early engagement with Network Rail, TfL and/or the Highways Authority will be essential to any proposals involving railway arches. INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH Tower Hamlets Local Plan 249 INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH Policy EG6: Data centres 1.
